# height

**Instance Property**

The height, in pixels, of the morphological structuring element.

## Declaration

```swift
var height: Float { get set }
```

## Discussion

The value is rounded to the nearest odd integer.

## Instance Properties

- **inputImage**: The image to use as an input image.
- **width**: The width, in pixels, of the morphological structuring element.
